entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests work item failures #75378
  • LibraryImport fails to Marshal ByValTStr (SYSLIB1051) #75376
  • Unable to run any Libraries tests on Ubuntu 22.04 ARM64 #75374
  • Autogenerate mobile app LocalBuild.props file #75370
  • [API Proposal]: Type.HasDefaultConstructor method #75362
  • Tar: ustar entries with long name unable to roundtrip #75360
    8.0.0
  • VectorConvert_r_Target_64Bit and VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit fail with LLVM 14 #75359
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection work planned for .NET 8 #75358
    8.0.0
  • Change IL Emit invoke path to use function pointers and OpCodes.Calli #75357
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run WebAssembly Browser App from VS or CLI #75356
    7.0.0
  • SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose failed with ObjectDisposedException #75354
  • [API Proposal]: Determining the http protocol version chosen by ClientWebSocket #75353
  • [API Proposal]: byref parameter collection for invoke #75349
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IL Emit support for FunctionPointer #75348
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Reflection invoke support for FunctionPointer #75347
    8.0.0
  • Native file reference freezing Blazor WASM build indefinitely #75345
  • QuicListener will not throw when listening on IPv6 address on systems with disabled IPv6 #75343
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld sample build configuration does not use same size optimizations as MAUI #75337
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Better communication between apphost and browser #75335
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchI\\Fib\\Fib\\Fib.cmd #75325
  • Error hot reloading new method in Blazor WebAssembly app #75324
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) #75322
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SplitFirst/SplitLast convenience methods for strings and Span/Memory<char> slices #75317
  • Memory leaking with Serializing JSON on Large Objects #75314

Closed

  • Crossgen2 crashes intermittently on Windows ARM64 #71702
    7.0.0
  • COSE needs to enforce that only NIST P-{256,384,521} are used #74684
    7.0.0
  • Enum Improvements #20008
    Future
  • Add flag Enum methods #28199
    Future
  • Add new ObsoleteAttribute constructor to accelerate forwarding to a different type. #28753
    Future
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75031
  • Suggestion/Question - Why is there no string type that enforces non-null, non-empty, non-whitespace strings? #30624
    Future
  • API proposal: string.SubstringUntil/string.SubstringAfter #661
    Future
  • CI failure: Native mono arm64 crash in System.Net.Requests.Tests #75368
  • Android AOT+LLVM `InvalidOperation_EnumEnded` #73304
    7.0.0
  • JIT: perf regression from improved local struct copy prop #75229
    8.0.0
  • Binary Xml format broken on big-endian machines #74494
    7.0.0
  • UnobservedTaskException's from ReadAheadWithZeroByteReadAsync #75355
  • [API Proposal]: IEnumerable<T> Default Implementation for IEnumerable #75351
  • Initial version for resolver for supporting DataContract and DataMember attributes in System.Text.Json #75226
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 and .NET 7-preview.7 comparing to .NET 5 when TERM is set to rxvt #75289
    7.0.0
  • The type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.EntityQueryable`1[xxx]' can only be serialized using async serialization methods. Path: $. #75327
  • Edge-case race condition in WebProxy #75134
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.GetProcessesByName_ProcessName_ReturnsExpected [FAIL] #75329
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'overlapped' has already been freed. at System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandleOverlapped.CompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) at System.Threading._IOCompletionCallback.PerformIOCompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) #72644
    Future
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs #74159
    6.0.x
  • CI failure in OSX x64 release NativeAOT SmokeTests SharedLibrary.sh #75005
    8.0.0
  • Bionic Android Mono CI failure in System.IO.Pipes named pipes unix domain socket tests (server and client) #75021

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IPv6 detection in QUIC tests #75382
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [NOREVIEW] Stress quic loading/unloading #75381
    area-System.Net
  • update helix queues to pick up MsQuic 2.1.1 #75380
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Some feedback for 8.0 after doing PR on #75366 for 7.0-rc2. #75379
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows (#75176) #75377
    area-System.Transactions
  • JIT: block copy/zero assertion gen for structs with exposed promoted … #75375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0][wasm][host] Track change in forwardConsole parameter to forwardConso… #75372
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    community-contribution
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix test issues on armv6, ppc64le on runtime-community #75367
    area-Meta, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Manually backporting #74599 to 7.0 for RC2. #75366
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75344
    area-System.Net
  • Missed full type initialization #75340
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Including ILStrip build task when building iOS sample app in fullAOT mode #75339
    area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • JIT: Quiet NaNs on x86 hosts #75338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/macOS] Link to libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl on macOS #75333
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing fix for workloads on main #75331
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use LastIndexOf{Any} in Path.GetFileName #75318
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Enable gsharedvt by default as an experiment. #75315
    NO-MERGE

Merged

  • Reuse more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration code in JS generators #74949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Skip Quic IPv6 tests on unsupported platforms #75341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75176
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75350
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix test issues on armv6, s390x and ppc64le on runtime-community #75282
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • JIT: propagate some block assertions after expansion #75321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/macOS] Allow lldb to skip over null reference exceptions #75332
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #75295
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #75159
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make CredScan happy with UriBuilder tests #75352
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix GCEvent::Wait with timeout on OSX #75316
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • update msquic to 2.1.1 #75287
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Remove Browser implementation of PBKDF2 one-shot. #75283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 8.0.0
  • Use HashCode.AddBytes in CodeHeaderValue.GetHashCode #75320
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in System.Reflection.Metadata Strings.resx #75336
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Use PopCount instead of loop for X.509 chain status #75277
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify AsnDecoder.ReverseBitsPerByte #75301
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Remove enumerator allocation when constructing RestrictedAsciiStringEncoding #75303
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Use IndexOf in NamespaceCache.SynthesizeNamespaceData #75319
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Use IndexOf in Uri.GetLocalPath #75323
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Do no test StartTime in GetProcessesByName test #75334
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • update Debian Helix images to msquic 2.1.1 #75291
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #75308
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75284
    area-System.Numerics
  • disable gcmemoryinfo on win-arm64 #75309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75246
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix GCEvent::Wait with timeout on OSX #75298
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • [workloads] Add new workloads for net8.0 #75200
    area-Build-mono
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Initial osx-arm64 bring up #75264
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Fix slow perf for serializing large payloads and add test #75147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • Publish assets immediately and clean some vars #75222
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #75261
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • remove Centos 8 from Helix as it is EOL #75299
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74226
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 (#46010) #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Unit test running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] add git hash to dotnet.js and print it from unit tests #75279
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Simplify windows version detection in vm #75254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
